programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When boxer John Kinsella wins a world title in New York, the village of Midsomer Morchard are overjoyed at his success. Shortly afterwards a solicitor is found dead by his assistant and Kinsella's manager. Barnaby and Jones start to investigate and come across infidelity, anger, betrayals and blackmail. When a Victorian prize-fight re-enactment turns nasty and Kinsella's manager is found murdered in his home's gym.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The Midsomer Conservation Society are up in arms, when a recent new build, called Swanscombe House is a highlight of an open garden day. It leads to an ugly confrontation between a couple of its members and those responsible for the planning application, design and build. The people of which are suspected of involvement in a money-making scam. Political squabbles, burglaries and sexual liaisons all come to the fore in picturesque Great Pelfe.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A spa weekend at Swavely Manor, proves far from relaxing, when Tom and Joyce Barnaby arrive. It starts stressful and goes rather downhill when a female client is found dead in the flotation chamber, by Joyce. Barnaby takes a break from his treatment to investigate alongside Jones. The mystery deepens when the woman's husband disappears in the night shortly afterwards. Tom's worries about his future seem to distract him from the case.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Causton is buzzing at the opening of a new brewery on the site of a famously cursed Abbey.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and Winter are thrust into a crime that impacts not only on their community, but internationally.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Carver Valleys comic festival is in full swing when the village is shocked by the murder of a former model.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A death at the local Rugby Club sends Barnaby and Winter into a muddle of rucks.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby is less than impressed when Sarah drags him to a family friends wedding.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Things take a gruesome turn when Ferrabees Circus comes to town.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A man is killed after the winner of an urban myth competition gains a cult following, and myth becomes reality

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: An outcast who was acquitted of murder years previously, comes under suspicion when more murders take place.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: DCI Barnaby and DS Winter are called in to investigate a possible death by poisoning.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A scarecrow festival takes a grisly turn when dead bodies are found staged like the straw creations.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: An amateur opera company is in the middle of rehearsals when a dead body is found in the theatre.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby must step into the spiritual world of mediums, psychics, and occult followers to find a killer.
